content.html:
I agree that we don't want something overly complex. We also need something that is flexible and capable of representing tree and graph structures.

The approach proposed here should be relatively easy to implement. Instead of implicit frames, which we currently have, every frame is explicit. We'll also have example code, and tutorials.

@scpeters, do you know why IHMC and dartsim implement their own parser? We might be able to improve libsdformat to be more attractive to them.
